S3Config.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM role that is used to access an Amazon S3 bucket.

properties.name: BucketAccessRoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the IAM role of the Amazon S3 bucket.

type.description: The ARN of the IAM role of the Amazon S3 bucket.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: S3BucketArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket.

properties.name: S3StorageClass
properties.description: The Amazon S3 storage class you want to store your files in when this location is used as a task destination.

type.description: The Amazon S3 storage class you want to store your files in when this location is used as a task destination.

properties.name: Subdirectory
properties.description: A subdirectory in the Amazon S3 bucket. This subdirectory in Amazon S3 is used to read data from the S3 source location or write data to the S3 destination.

type.description: A subdirectory in the Amazon S3 bucket. This subdirectory in Amazon S3 is used to read data from the S3 source location or write data to the S3 destination.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: LocationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket location.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket location.

properties.name: LocationUri
properties.description: The URL of the S3 location that was described.

type.description: The URL of the S3 location that was described.
